actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to insure equal protection of the laws as guaranteed by the 5th or 14th amendments to the Constitution of the United States.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
subjects_top_term: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Limits the power of any United States court to issue school transportation orders based on race, color, or national origin. Stipulates that only a three judge district court may issue a school assignment order based on race, color, or national origin. Requires the holding of a special hearing where specific findings in relation to such a constitutional violation must be made before a school assignment order may issue. Stays such school assignment orders until all appeals have been exhausted.

titles.title: A bill to insure equal protection of the laws as guaranteed by the 5th or 14th amendments to the Constitution of the United States.
